amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Edmunds Center for the Arts, City of Edmunds, WA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Edmunds Center for the Arts, City of Edmunds, WA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 327 (Roll no. 705).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
